msg.msgText: The XA transaction branch can be forgotten by using the "imaserver forget" command. Use this command only when you are certain that the transaction cannot be resolved by the normal protocols. Issuing this command might result in the loss of transactional integrity between resource managers for a distributed transaction. SYNTAX: imaserver forget help imaserver forget Transaction "XID=value" EXAMPLE: imaserver forget Transaction "XID=57415344:0000014247FEBB3D000000012008CC78A1A981840C3350B9E23A3C2EFB8E5A6D864A89C0:00000001"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
